Package guigraph

In this package the graphical user interface for the sigma game on graphs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DeleteMouseListener This is a mouse listener which deletes objects (vertices and edges) by clicking on them.
EdgeMouseListener This is a mouse listener which draws an edge between the vertex, where the mouse is clicked and the one, where it is released.
GameMouseListener This MouseListener reacts only on clicks on vertices of the basic graph.
GamingGraph Encapsulates the connection between the graph on which the game works and the game logic.
GraphAnalyseToolBar This class is the version of the #AnalyseToolBar for graphs.
GraphBoard This class provides the game board for arbitrary graphs.
GraphMSPOption This class represents an option panel for the sigma-game on graphs.
GraphToolBar This class describes the ToolBar for drawing graphs to create the game board and start the game.
InputMouseListener This MouseListener reacts only on clicks on vertices of the basic graph.
MoveMouseListener This is a MouseListener, which moves chosen vertices to a place, where the mouse is released.
SelectionFrame A Frame where the user can choose some programmed graphs to analyse the sigma game on them or to change them to own graphs.
VertexMouseListener This is a MouseListener, which creates vertices at the place, where the user clicks on the given component.
 

Package guigraph Description

In this package the graphical user interface for the sigma game on graphs. Here the graphs are implemented with the library JGraphX and the connection between game and user interface is taken care of.
